2_1A6hcWNpQ9SSLoTTpuT19VsVQ6WCVRkyen.body:
Looks like that More Sites list is just a collection of demo sites that you are not connected to. So, the answer for 2 seems yes. List of demo sites is hardcoded and maintained by ZeroNet devs on GitHub. 
https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroHello/blob/master/js/SiteList.coffee

> [scrub](#comment_49_1ADB7TdX2fVbTsWBoMe9yBTmVXTbb33b4R): Why does this constantly say 'Just now', even though it was posted like 5~ hours ago? Okay, it's clearly bugged, my post went underneath yours.

```
$ TZ="UTC" date --date="@1457178998"
Sat Mar  5 11:56:38 UTC 2016
```

ninjamikyo1's clock must be skewed.

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1JStzUwCtg2uU6NeuwyTbuUqwGwDZH5HG7

ブラウザ上でIDを生成してみるテストです。「ID作成」ボタンを押すとユーザ選択画面が表れるので「ほにゃらら@nanasi」を選択してください。
@nanasi IDはこのサイト以外では使用できません。また、このIDを消すにはZeroNetの設定ファイルを弄って再起動する必要があるのでご注意ください。

これを実装すればサイト毎に別のIDを作れるので、全サイトでの活動がZeroIDで紐付けられるよりましかと思います。

3_168qV1Xxp2EyszrzdECLUwXrn9wGYjDdar.body:
I created a simple text board where you can post without an account registered at ZeroID, but with one created in the browser:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/16KzwuSAjFnivNimSHuRdPrYd1pNPhuHqN

This is an experiment that utilizes bitcoinjs-lib to generate an account without any central server.

Source code: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1MgHVPCE1ve6QfKrgsqCURzRj72HrRWioz/?16Szsy1UtjiXpEevWVdUDrNfNTAZ9PLbcY_33
